description: I collaborated with international teams in the development of web applications, with a strong focus on accessibility and responsive design.
I gained experience working fully remote under agile, scrum and kanban based workflows, by using tools such as Slack, Trello and GitHub Projects.

I contributed to the layout of the frontend using libraries such as Material UI and Tailwind CSS, on the backend side by supporting the API and database designs, and improved handling of http requests.
ICT teaching assistant and Physics professor, I taught high school students the best practices and modern syntax of the programming languages JavaScript and Python.
I built a conceptual design of 'MathCalc Pro', a web app to help high school students develop confidence in their reasoning and problem solving skills.
I got my students to win 13 awards in state, national and international science olympiads and rallies.
High school professor in the subjects of Physics, Mathematics and ICT.
I developed basic projects with my students using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and Arduino, as well as the LabPlot data analysis software.
I managed for more than 80% of my students to be admitted to their first choice university, as well as for a student to win an award in a state physics olympiad.
